QuestData.Title: A Floating Ruin
QuestData.Description: We knew the Legion to be a formidable foe, but recent events demonstrate that we do not possess the necessary strength to continue. We have come too far to fail at this critical moment.$b$bI know of a relic on Eredath, my ancient home, that may be our salvation. We must take the Vindicaar beyond the surface of Argus, to the floating ruin suspended above us.$b$bPerhaps there we will find the salvation we so desperately need.
QuestData.RewardText: <Velen's gaze is drawn to the ruins spread out before him.>$b$bI am home.

Objectives.Objective: Use the Navigation Console to go to Eredath
